model.Comment

    • Uses of Comment in adapter

      Constructor and Description

    • Uses of Comment in cache

      Methods in cache with parameters of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CacheController.AddCacheReply(Activity activity, java.lang.String parentId, Comment reply)
      Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences,(into a CommentList pointed by a key which is the same as the given comment's parent's id) if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by a key equals the given comment's parent's id.
      void CacheController.AddFav(Activity activity, Comment comment)
      Add a new comment in to sharedpreferences as favorite comment,(into a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES") if the CommentList not exist, a new CommentList will be created and the given Comment will be added, then that CommentList will be stored as a CommentList pointed by key "FAVOURITES".

    • Uses of Comment in comparator

      Methods in comparator with parameters of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int TimeComparator.compare(Comment a, Comment b)
      A method which compares the difference between 2 comment's post time while sorting.

    • Uses of Comment in model

      Methods in model that return Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Comment CommentMap.getComment(java.lang.String id)
      Get a specific Comment with its own id from the CommentMap.
      Methods in model that return types with arguments of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Comment> CommentMap.getCurrentList() 
      java.util.List<Comment> CommentList.getCurrentList() 
      Methods in model with parameters of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommentList.add(Comment comment)
      Add a Comment object to the CommentList, if a Comment with a same id already exists, then the old one will be removed before the new one been added.
      void Comment.addReply(Comment comment)
      Add the comment id of a reply Comment object to the reply id set.
      void Comment.setParent(Comment parent) 
      void CommentMap.updateComment(Comment comment)
      Update a Comment object in the CommentMap with its own id, if no Comment with the same ID exists, then added the Comment object to the CommentMap, notify the ArrayAdapter the data set has changed after update if the ArrayAdapter has been set.

    • Uses of Comment in network_io

      Methods in network_io with parameters of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IoStreamHandler.commitUpdateComment(Comment comment)
      Update a comment with its own id to the web server, if the comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this comment will be added to the server.
